title: So, what are Board warnings?
body: If i type something and its "bad" or "wrong" as Riot thinks it is, and I get sent a warning has been issued, does this pile up over time or is it like a period of time and then cleared? or what is this and how do they work?

replies.body: Lol! Basically what Targons Blade just did is a board warning

I'd recommend posting this question to the [**Player Behavior & Moderation Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation), as these types of posts are more suited there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
